about_the_game:
On February 11, 2022, it was newly upgraded, adding a variety of functions, such as hardware detection, creative workshop, etc., and retaining the previous version. I hope to reverse the previous evaluation, and I hope you can support it!

About solving the problem of incomplete information acquisition of some machines


Right mouse button attribute of game list in Steam client ==> Local file ==> Browse => Find "MonitorGirl2. exe" ==> Right mouse button attribute ==> Compatibility ==> Change settings of all users ==> Check to run this program as administrator == >OK

New upgrade on February 11, 2022

  • 1. Add hardware detection (CPU, GPU, ram, disk...)
  • 2. Support steam workshops
  • 3. Three sets of templates, diversified window monitoring Pendant

Old Version Feature List

  • 1. The younger sister swings her lower leg to help you monitor the PC on the video card. As the CPU temperature increases, the younger sister will change.
  • 2. Identify CPU model, monitor CPU utilization rate and CPU temperature.
  • 3. Identify the model of GPU, monitor the usage rate of GPU and monitor the temperature of GPU.
  • 4. Monitor memory usage.
  • 5. Monitor the utilization rate of hard disk space.
  • 6. Display time.
detailed_description:
On February 11, 2022, it was newly upgraded, adding a variety of functions, such as hardware detection, creative workshop, etc., and retaining the previous version. I hope to reverse the previous evaluation, and I hope you can support it!

About solving the problem of incomplete information acquisition of some machines


Right mouse button attribute of game list in Steam client ==> Local file ==> Browse => Find "MonitorGirl2. exe" ==> Right mouse button attribute ==> Compatibility ==> Change settings of all users ==> Check to run this program as administrator == >OK

New upgrade on February 11, 2022

  • 1. Add hardware detection (CPU, GPU, ram, disk...)
  • 2. Support steam workshops
  • 3. Three sets of templates, diversified window monitoring Pendant

Old Version Feature List

  • 1. The younger sister swings her lower leg to help you monitor the PC on the video card. As the CPU temperature increases, the younger sister will change.
  • 2. Identify CPU model, monitor CPU utilization rate and CPU temperature.
  • 3. Identify the model of GPU, monitor the usage rate of GPU and monitor the temperature of GPU.
  • 4. Monitor memory usage.
  • 5. Monitor the utilization rate of hard disk space.
  • 6. Display time.
name: Monitor Girl | 监控姬

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 Home Premium or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 4170 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: This is a PC computer monitoring software, which can monitor the performance of your computer in real time, with excellent performance and low CPU and GPU occupancy. It supports hardware detection, Steam Workshop...
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
